p: Lung ACE2 is the receptor for both SARS-CoV and SARS-CoV-2 ( 13, 31). The spike (S) protein binds to ACE2 and enters the cell where it is modified by a serine protease (TMPRSS2). This protease is essential for cell entry of the virus ( 31). The binding of coronaviruses to ACE2 and the modification of its spike protein by TMPRSS2 are essential for infection.
